remarks: Closure for finite recursion.  (Contributed by Jim Kingdon, 25-May-2020.)
statement:
freccl.ex $e |- ( ph -> A. z ( F ` z ) e. _V ) $.
freccl.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. S ) $.
freccl.cl $e |- ( ( ph /\ z e. S ) -> ( F ` z ) e. S ) $.
freccl.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. _om ) $.
freccl $p |- ( ph -> ( frec ( F , A ) ` B ) e. S ) $.
$d A z $.
$d F z $.
$d S z $.
$d ph z $.
